full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,CHOS SKYONG BA'I BSRUNG MA'I KHYAD PAR CAN RGYAL PO CHEN PO RNAM THOS SRAS KYI BSNYEN BSGRUB LAS GSUM GYI RNAM BZHAG RGYA CHER BSHAD PA BKLAG PAS DON GRUB ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @018A *, ,(CES CHOS SKYONG BA'I BSRUNG MA RGYAL PO CHEN PO RNAM THOS SRAS KYI BSNYEN BSGRUB LAS GSUM GYI CHO GA RGYA CHER BSHAD PA KLAG PAS DON GRUB ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI SHAR PHYOGS BSTAN PA'I GSAL BYED DAM PA RNAM 'DREN SPRUL BA'I SKU RIN PO CHE BLO BZANG SHES RAB RGYA MTSOS RIN CHEN GNYIS PA'I MAndAL KHA BTAGS BSKYEL DANG BCAS SHUL RING NAS NAN TAN CHEN PO'I GSUNG GIS BSKUL BAS, GNYIS LHAG BCU PHRAG ZUNG GI SLOB DPON RNAMS KYI BRAN DU GYUR BA'I RAB 'BYAMS SMRA BA YE SHES BSKAL BZANG MING GZHAN MI BSKYOD RDO RJE DANG, CHEN PO BOD KYI RGYAL KHAMS SU AA CHI THU THU MER GEN CHOS RJER 'BOD PAS 'JIG RTEN DU DGE BAR GYUR CIG ,LEGS SO, ,DGE'O, ,)
